The information contained within this page is to be read by the user before progressing further into the application than the user registration/sign up page. By agreeing to the terms and conditions you accept all of the following:


1. Terms of Use 

 1.1. Right to Terminate Users: By agreeing to the terms of use you agree to follow any rules set out by RocketQuiz in terms of the user behaviour when using the application. RocketQuiz has the right to terminate or ban your account if you fail to meet expectations of users and fall out of accordance with the rules.

 1.2. Copyright Infringement: If any content you provide breaches copyright laws, RocketQuiz has the right to remove the infringing material without notice.
RocketQuiz will only act upon infringing copyright material should the rightful owner make a claim and provide any relevant information and body of proof to show official ownership of content.

 1.3. Retention of the Right to Change the App at Any Time: RocketQuiz has the sole right to modify and alter the application in any way. This includes the removal or discontinuing of features.

 1.4. Distribution: The user has the right to access the application from the relevant application store whether it be Google Play or App Store. RocketQuiz agrees to non-exclusive, worldwide, and perpetual license to perform, display, and use the Product on the Device.

 1.5. Freedom of Use: RocketQuiz will provide you with the means to alter or remove your account from the application should you deem fit.


2. User Information 

 2.1. User Details: Any details you provide within the application such as name, email, photo, etc. can be stored and used by RocketQuiz. This includes any details obtained via social services such as Facebook and Google.

 2.2. Information Security: Any information provided by the user will be appropriately stored and used. RocketQuiz will not misuse your information. RocketQuiz sets out to meet the standards of governing bodies and the laws they set out in regards to copyright, computer misuse and the storing of data.

 2.3. Sensitive Information: RocketQuiz will set out to make sure they follow all the best practices when storing any sensitive information from the user. Should any issues arise with a users personal information within RocketQuiz or on any website or application such as unauthorised access to a users account, RocketQuiz will not be held responsible. The user should follow steps to minimise the risk of unauthorised access by:

 a) Not sharing their email and passwords with anybody.

 b) Not sharing their device containing RocketQuiz with anybody.

 c) Not using the same email and password combination across services and platforms.

 d) Follow strong password creation measures such as using upper and lowercase characters, special characters and numbers in their password and avoiding common password phrases such as: 'letmein', 'password', pet names or the users real name.


3. Content Provided by User 

 3.1. Ownership of User Content: RocketQuiz does not claim any ownership of user provided content, the sole rights to the ownership of the content belongs to the user.

 3.2. Use of User Content: By accepting the terms and conditions you agree for RocketQuiz to make use of any information or content you provide and upload via the application in any marketing material which will not require the user to be credited or compensated in any manner for use of their content. Although RocketQuiz has no ownership of the users content, RocketQuiz has the right to display the content in any method deemed appropriate by the RocketQuiz team and any service provider requirements.


4. Legal 

 4.1. You will take no legal actions against RocketQuiz or the service providers should you accept the terms and conditions set out by any of the providers such as RocketQuiz, Facebook and Google or any subsidiaries that are owned by the named companies and organisations.


Should you not agree with any of the stated information above, you are not being forced or are required to use the RocketQuiz application and should proceed to delete the application from your mobile or tablet device before registering an account.
